Zouuup/landrun

run Linux apps in a secure sandbox with Landlock, no root needed

View on index

Related repos

  • Sandbox for containers that runs Linux system calls in userspace, sits between apps and the host kernel
  • Self-hosted file storage with encryption and moving target defense
  • Linux OS for running Home Assistant on Raspberry Pi, NUC, and more
  • Runs Windows apps on Linux via containerized virtual machines
  • Manages environment variables with encryption
  • Boot sector OS with shell, file system, process management, x86 assembly, SDK
  • personal cloud OS for home servers and Zima hardware
  • Run Docker images on Android with Termux, no root needed
  • Deployment tool for containerized web apps
